raw_client = <utils.api_client.ApiClient object at 0x000001ABF3C62530>

    def test_register(raw_client):
        cases = load_yaml("data/register.yaml")
        env = get_env()
    
        for case in cases:
            with allure.step(case.get("desc", "注册接口")):
    
                resp = raw_client.request(
                    method="POST",
                    url="/auth/register",
                    params=case["request"].get("params"),
                    json_body=case["request"]
                )
    
                # ============================
                # 🌍 prod 环境验证码兜底处理
                # ============================
                if env == "prod":
                    biz = resp.biz_json or {}
                    code = biz.get("code")
    
                    if resp.status_code == 400 and code == 40091:
                        logging.warning("⚠ prod 环境注册接口触发验证码，自动 skip")
                        pytest.skip("prod 环境注册接口有验证码，跳过自动化校验")
    
                # ============================
                # ✅ 正常断言（pre / 非验证码）
                # ============================
>               biz = assert_api_response(resp, case["expected"])

expected = {'allow_biz_codes': [200, 40091], 'allow_http_codes': [200, 400], 'token_prefix': 'Bearer'}

    def assert_api_response(resp, expected):
        """
        通用接口断言（完全适配 ApiResponse）
        """
    
        # ======================
        # 0️⃣ 响应展示（先做，避免断言失败看不到）
        # ======================
        body = _safe_response_body(resp)
        logging.info(f"[HTTP] status={getattr(resp, 'status_code', None)}")
        # logging.info(f"[RESP] body={body}")
    
        _attach("response_body", body)
    
        # ======================
        # ① HTTP 状态码校验
        # ======================
        allow_http = expected.get("allow_http_codes", [200])
        if allow_http:
            assert resp.status_code in allow_http, \
                f"接口返回的HTTP状态码 {resp.status_code} 不在允许范围 {allow_http}内"
    
        # ======================
        # ② 业务 code 校验
        # ======================
        allow_biz = expected.get("allow_biz_codes", [0])
        if allow_biz:
            biz_json = resp.biz_json or {}
            biz_code = _extract_biz_code(biz_json)
    
            # 字符串数字 → int
            try:
                if isinstance(biz_code, str) and biz_code.isdigit():
                    biz_code = int(biz_code)
            except Exception:
                pass
    
            logging.info(f"[实际返回] code={biz_code}, [断言] code={allow_biz}")
    
            try:
